name: ⋆ Difference Games
description:
#1 Top Rated Find the Difference Game!

Give us a try and see for yourself why we are the #1 Find the Differences game on the App Store.

• Gorgeous, high definition content that takes advantage of the great screens on Apple devices
• Tons of themes and levels to challenge you
• Super laid back and relaxing way to play. A great way to melt the stress away.
• 100% Free. No subscriptions.

We will be updating the content frequently, so make sure to leave us a review and let us know what you would like to see next!

Big Bear Entertainment. We love games!
